CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleKeyDownEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local key = event.key -------------------------------------------------------- if key == KeyboardKey.Space or key == KeyboardKey.LeftAlt then if not self.Entity.RigidbodyComponent:IsOnGround() and self.is_second_jump == false then local lookDirectionX = self.Entity.PlayerControllerComponent.LookDirectionX self.Entity.RigidbodyComponent:SetForce(Vector2(lookDirectionX * self.Jump_front, self.jump_force)) _SoundService:PlaySound("53ee91e851cc427c9c09337feabd7c9e",0.7)
self.is_second_jump = true end end
if self.Entity.RigidbodyComponent:IsOnGround() == true then self.is_second_jump = false end
